definition: to return a product for another item
to retreat/to decline/to move back/to withdraw
to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)

sentences.chinese: 你們的退換貨政策是什麼？

sentences.english: We accept returns up to seven days after purchase but we do not cover shipping and handling.
sentences.chinese: 可以，七天內都可以退換貨，但是運費需要您來承擔。

sentences.english: Handling the complaints, returning and changing the goods, consultation.
sentences.chinese: 處理客戶投訴，退換貨以及諮詢服務。

sentences.english: Return service temporarily set up shop, so please be cautious orders.
sentences.chinese: 本店暫不設置退換貨服務，所以請謹慎下單。

sentences.english: Without contact with Shanghai Bazaar, no returns or exchanges can be made.
sentences.chinese: 退換貨之前未與上海市集取得聯繫。

sentences.english: Party A shall accept the return of or replace the Commodity with quality problems.
sentences.chinese: 對於存在質量問題的商品，甲方應當予以退換貨。

definition: to replace a purchase/to exchange a purchase
summary/to summarize/to collect (data, receipts etc)/to gather and report/also written 匯總|汇总
bill of warrant (certificate, allowing one to collect money or valuables)
